Which officer under Alauddin Khilji was required to maintain a register of merchants to ensure an adequate supply of goods?माल की पर्याप्त आपूर्ति सुनिश्चित करने हेतु अलाउद्दीन खिलजी के अधीन किस अधिकारी के लिए व्यापारियों का रजिस्टर बनाए रखना आवश्यक था?

Which of the following is NOT correct with regards to the history of calculating National Income (NI) in India?भारत में राष्ट्रीय आय (NI) की गणना के इतिहास के संबंध में निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा कथन सही नहीं है?
option_1: First official attempt to compute NI was made by PC Mahalanobis./NI की गणना करने का पहला आधिकारिक प्रयास पीसी महालनोबिस द्वारा किया गया था।
option_2: First scientific method to compute NI was used by Dr VKRV Rao./NI की गणना करने के लिए पहली वैज्ञानिक पद्धति का उपयोग डॉ वी. के. आर.वी राव ने किया था।
option_3: Dadabhai Naoroji divided the Indian economy into two parts: primary sector and secondary sector./ दादाभाई नौरोजी ने भारतीय अर्थव्यवस्था को दो भागों में विभाजित कियाः प्राथमिक क्षेत्र और द्वितीयक क्षेत्र।
option_4: First attempt to compute NI was made by Dadabhai Naoroji./NI की गणना करने का पहला प्रयास दादाभाई नौरोजी ने किया था।

question: Who among the following, while praising the amending feature of the Indian Constitution said that This variety in the amending process is wise but is rarely found'?निम्नलिखित में से किसने भारतीय संविधान की संशोधित विशेषता की प्रशंसा करते हुए कहा था कि 'संशोधन प्रक्रिया में यह विविधता बुद्धिमानी है लेकिन बहुत कम पाई जाती है'?
Which of the following characteristics is NOT of Aves? निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सी विशेषता, एवीज (Aves) की नहीं है?
option_1: These are warm-blooded animals./ये गर्म खून वाले जीव होते हैं।
option_2: They give birth to live young ones with some exceptions those lay eggs. ये जीवित बच्चों को जन्म देते हैं, कुछ अपवादों को छोड़कर जो कि अंडे देते हैं।
option_3: They breathe through the lungs/ये फेफड़ों से सांस लेते हैं।
option_4: They have four-chambered heart. / इनका हृदय चार कक्षीय होता है।

question: Which national park in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands is home to species like Megapode, crab-eating Macaque, Nicobar Pigeon, and Giant Robber Crab?महापद पक्षी, केकड़ाभक्षी मकाक (बंदर), निकोबार कबूतर और विशालकाय दस्यु केकड़े जैसी प्रजातियों का घर है?
option_1: Campbell Bay National Park/कैंपबेल बे राष्ट्रीय उद्यान
option_2: Raimona National Park / रायमोना राष्ट्रीय उद्यान
option_3: Mouling National Park / मौलिंग राष्ट्रीय उद्यान
option_4: Papikonda National Park / पापिकोंडा राष्ट्रीय उद्यान

question: With which of the following dances is Yamini Krishnamurthy associated?यामिनी कृष्णमूर्ति निम्नलिखित में से किस नृत्य से सम्बंधित हैं?
In which year did the Central Government launch the National Air Sports Policy?केंद्र सरकार ने किस वर्ष 'राष्ट्रीय हवाई खेल नीति' शुरू की?

Which of the following options represents the total income earned by individuals from all the sources before deduction of personal income taxes? निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा विकल्प, वैयक्तिक आयकरों की कटौती से पहले सभी स्रोतों से व्यक्तियों द्वारा अर्जित कुल आय को निरूपित करता

Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding the Arya Samaj and Swami Dayanand Saraswati?आर्य समाज और स्वामी दयानंद सरस्वती के संबंध में निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा/से कथन सही है/हैं?Statement/कथन A:The original name of Swami Dayanand Saraswati was Mool Shankar Tiwari.स्वामी दयानंद सरस्वती का मूल नाम, मूलशंकर तिवारी था।Statement/कथन B:Swami Dayanand Saraswati was a native of Gujarat. स्वामी दयानंद सरस्वती, गुजरात के मूल निवासी थे।Statement/कथन C:The Arya Samaj was founded in the year 1875. आर्य समाज की स्थापना वर्ष 1875 में हुई थी।
option_1: All of A, B and C/A, B और C सभी
option_3: Only A and B/केवल A और B

question: In India, who among the following is responsible for auditing all receipts and expenditure of the Union and State governments?भारत में, केंद्र और राज्य सरकारों की सभी प्राप्तियों और व्यय की संपरीक्षा करने की जिम्मेदारी निम्नलिखित में से किसकी होती है?
option_1: Attorney General for India / भारत के महान्यायवादी
option_3: Union Public Service Commission/संघ लोक सेवा आयोग
option_4: Comptroller and Auditor- General/नियंत्रक एवं महालेखापरीक्षक

question: What will be the average kinetic energy per molecule in SI units for an ideal gas at a temperature of 25°C? 25°C के तापमान पर एक आदर्श गैस के लिए एसआई (SI) इकाई में प्रति अणु औसत गतिज ऊर्जा क्या होगी?

Which amongst the following terms was used for the land given to Brahmins during the Chola empire? चोल साम्राज्य के दौरान ब्राह्मणों को दी गई भूमि के लिए निम्नलिखित में से किस शब्द का उपयोग किया जाता था?

Which law states that endothermic animals from cold climates have smaller extremities or appendages than closely related species from warm climates?कौन-सा सिद्धांत यह उल्लेख करता है कि शीत जलवायु के आंतरोष्मी प्राणियों में ऊष्म जलवायु से संबंधित प्रजातियों की तुलना में छोटे अंग या उपांग होते हैं?
What was the distance (around in km) covered by the first-ever train between Bombay and Thane in 1853? 1853 में बंबई और ठाणे के बीच पहली बार ट्रेन द्वारा तय की गई दूरी (लगभग किमी में) कितनी थी?
Who was the chief coordinator for the G20 summit hosted by India?भारत द्वारा आयोजित G20 शिखर सम्मेलन के लिए मुख्य समन्वयक कौन है?
The Reserve Bank of India introduced a comprehensive regulatory framework for NBFC-MFI onभारतीय रिजर्व बैंक ने को एनबीएफसी-एमएफआई (NBFC- MFI) के लिए एक व्यापक नियामक ढांचा पेश किया था।

Identify the INCORRECTLY matched pair(s) of the British Governor-Generals of India and the events with which they are associated.भारत के ब्रिटिश गवर्नर जनरलों और उनसे संबंधित घटनाओं के मिलान के गलत युग्मों का चयन कीजिए।i) Lord Dalhousie Revolt of 1857 -लॉर्ड डलहौजी 1857 का विद्रोहii) Lord Auckland - First Afghan Warलॉर्ड ऑकलैंड - प्रथम अफगान युद्धiii) Lord Canning - Wood's Despatch 1854लॉर्ड कैनिंग - वुड्स डिस्पैच 1854

Which of the following statements are INCORREСТ?निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा कथन गलत है?1) The Original Jurisdiction establishes the Supreme Court as an umpire in all disputes regarding federal matters / मूल अधिकार क्षेत्र संघीय मामलों से संबंधित सभी विवादों में सर्वोच्च न्यायालय को एक निर्णायक के रूप में स्थापित करता है।2) The Supreme Court can give special orders in the form of writs/सर्वोच्च न्यायालय रिट के रूप में विशेष आदेश दे सकता है।3) Article 129 of the Indian Constitution mention about appointment of acting Chief Justice of India / भारतीय संविधान के अनुच्छेद 129 में भारत के कार्यवाहक मुख्य न्यायाधीश की नियुक्ति का उल्लेख है।4) Every Judge of the Supreme Court of India shall be appointed by the Prime Minister of India / भारत के सर्वोच्च न्यायालय के प्रत्येक न्यायाधीश की नियुक्ति भारत के प्रधान मंत्री द्वारा की जाएगी।

According to Mendeleev's Periodic Table, which elements' properties matched up remarkably well with eka-silicon?मेंडलीफ की आवर्त सारणी के अनुसार, किन तत्वों के गुण ईका-सिलिकॉनके साथ पर्याप्त मेल खाते हैं?

Which country do the 'Veddas' traditional forest dwellers who foraged, hunted and lived in close-knit groups in caves in the dense jungles?'वेदा (Veddas)' पारंपरिक वनवासी किस देश के निवासी थे, जो चारा खोजते थे, शिकार करते थे और घने जंगलों में गुफाओं में एकजुट समूहों में रहते थे?
Papanasam Ramayya Sivan was an Indian composer of which music style?पापनासम रामय्या सिवन किस संगीत शैली के भारतीय संगीतकार थे?

In May 2023, the Supreme Court of India granted couples the right to get divorce on the grounds of 'irretrievable breakdown of marriage' under Indian Constitution. of theमई 2023 में, भारत के सर्वोच्च न्यायालय ने युगलों को भारतीय संविधान के के अंतर्गत 'विवाह के असाध्य रूप से टूटने' के आधार पर तलाक लेने का अधिकार दिया।
Who among the following was the author of 'Brihat Katha Kosh'?निम्नलिखित में से कौन 'बृहत कथा कोष (Brihat Katha Kosh)' के लेखक थे?

To check the presence of adulterated sugar solution honey, a cotton wick dipped in sample is ignited with a match stick. Adulteration is confirmed if:शहद में मिलावटी चीनी के घोल की जांच करने के लिए, नमूने में रुई की बत्ती भिगोकर उसे माचिस की तीली से जलाया जाता है। मिलावट की पुष्टि होती है यदिः
option_1: it burns with a violet coloured flame/ यह बैंगनी रंग की लौ के साथ जलता है।
option_2: it burns smoothly/यह आसानी से जल जाता है।
option_3: it burns with a green coloured flame / यह हरे रंग की लौ के साथ जलता है।
option_4: it burns with a crackling sound/ यह चटचटाहट की ध्वनि के साथ जलता है।

Parts of a sentence are given below in jumbled order. Arrange the parts in the correct order to form a meaningful sentence.(A) It is also called a nuclear family.(B) It is good to be in a small family because there is better management of resources.(C) A small family is one with parents and a maximum of two children.(D) The advantages of a small family are numerous.
Select the option that expresses the given sentence in active voice.The painting was admired by art enthusiasts from around the world.
option_1: The painting was being admired by art enthusiasts from around the world.
option_2: Art enthusiasts from around the world admired the painting.
option_3: Art enthusiasts from around the world have admired the painting.
option_4: The painting has been admired by art enthusiasts from around the world.

question: Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.Taut

The following sentence has been divided into four segments. Identify the segment that contains an error in the usage of the interjection.He replied / in a dry tone, / “Ouch! I will not work / for you anymore.”
The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains an error.Dr. Sinha has / brought about a new / book on social / impact of child labour.
Select the sentence that contains a spelling error.
option_1: The host institution must provide the delegates with accomodation at a subsidised rate.
option_2: The occurrence of the lunar eclipse is often a mystery for children.

question: Select the most appropriate homophone to fill in the blank.Her father _______ her to opt for a chemistry ______ in her final year.

Sentences of a paragraph are given below in jumbled order. Arrange the sentences in the correct order to form a meaningful and coherent paragraph.A. It was as simple as announcing what you have in your store or the services you offer in your premises.B. Over the years, advertising has evolved into a major industry that goes beyond informing to persuading and influencing.C. Advertising was initially meant to make people aware of the goods available in the market.D. It is a form of brainwashing consumers.

Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined part of the given sentence. If there is no need to substitute it, select ‘No substitution’.As the rulers of the planet, humans like to think that it is the largest creatures that will emerge victorious from the struggle for survival.
option_2: it is the most large creatures

question: Identify the error in the following sentence.Brr, the city view from the Eiffel Tower is amazing!
Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word in the given sentence.The patient was suffering from a chronic disease.
Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word.The long-standing feud between the two villages was settled due to the intervention of the two chiefs.
Select the most appropriate idiom to fill the blank in the given situation.I thought Sadhna would always stick by me, but when I got into trouble, she turned out to be a/an ___________.
Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined word segment in the given sentence.Her thinning grey hair was hanging on her bony forehead.

Select the option that spots the error in the use of preposition in the given sentence.Deepa and Seema are both good with running, but Deepa is also good at catching the ball and throwing it to the right corner in time.
Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the underlined group of words.Humour that describes the weaknesses of the other person is itself a crime among peer groups.
Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.Kilter
Select the most appropriate idiom of the given words.Dog days of summer
option_3: The hottest day of the summer

question: Select the option that correctly expresses the given sentence in passive voice.The shareholders will elect him a director
option_1: He will be elected as director by the shareholders
option_2: The shareholders have elected him a director.
option_3: The shareholders elected him a director.
option_4: He will be elected a director.

question: Select the most appropriate synonym of the bracketed word in the following sentence to fill in the blank.The media, these days, constructs _____ (misleading) narrative on politics and celebrities to increase the viewership.

Select the most appropriate option to fill in each blank.In today’s fast-paced and technology-driven world, (1) _______ is crucial to disconnect occasionally for the sake of our health. (2) _____ exposure to screens and the demands of the digital era can lead to stress, anxiety and reduced well-being. Taking time to unplug and engage (3) _____ activities that promote relaxation, such as spending time in nature, (4) _____ hobbies or simply enjoying quality time with loved ones allows us to recharge, find balance and (5) ______ our mental and physical health.21. Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 1.

Select the most appropriate option to fill in each blank.In today’s fast-paced and technology-driven world, (1) _______ is crucial to disconnect occasionally for the sake of our health. (2) _____ exposure to screens and the demands of the digital era can lead to stress, anxiety and reduced well-being. Taking time to unplug and engage (3) _____ activities that promote relaxation, such as spending time in nature, (4) _____ hobbies or simply enjoying quality time with loved ones allows us to recharge, find balance and (5) ______ our mental and physical health.Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 4.
